content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello, Baihu Li. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. Let's discuss further to come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month. I am a student, so I am on a budget and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer of 500 Euro per month. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am looking to maximize my gains as a landlord. I would like to counter with a rental price of 600 Euro per month. This is a reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment in this location. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to accept the rental price of 600 Euro per month. I understand the value of the apartment and the location. Thank you for your understanding.

Can we talk about the lease agreement? I would like to make sure I understand the terms and conditions before signing.

Also, do you require a security deposit? And if so, what is the amount?

Thank you again for your help.

Best regards,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Certainly, Baihu Li. I am glad to hear that you are willing to accept the rental price of 600 Euro per month. As for the lease agreement, I can provide you with a copy that outlines the terms and conditions. The lease agreement will include details such as the length of the lease, any fees or penalties, and any rules or regulations that you need to follow while living in the apartment.

Regarding a security deposit, I do require one. The amount of the security deposit will be 2,000 Euro. This deposit is meant to cover any potential damages or unpaid rent that may occur during your stay in the apartment.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement. Thank you for your interest in my apartment, and I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
